name: Barista
description: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
first_night_desc: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
other_night_desc: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
